name: c-gpt
description: Summarise articles and ask follow-up questions using LLMs such as OpenAI's GPT (Chat GPT). Helps summarise and highlights main points of any article, without having to read the whole article. You can also ask follow-up questions about the article, and it will provide you with answers based on page contents of a current tab.
privacy_single_purpose: Helps summarise and highlights main points of any article, without having to read the whole article. Also allows users to ask follow-up questions about the article, and it will provide answers based on page contents of a current tab.

justifications.activeTab: Required to read the text-only contents of a current tab
justifications.scripting: Parses the text content of a current page to summarise and answer follow-up questions
justifications.remote_code: Makes call to LLM APIs such as OpenAI's GPT (Chat GPT) Chat APIs to summarise articles
